Class DC

java.lang.Object
DC
public class DC extends Object
A distribution center representing the type of matching of aids donated and received from the donors and NGOs Type of aids matching consists of 1-to-1, 1-to-many, many-to-1, many-to-many

    many_to_many()
    To match fews donor with fews ngo for the condition whereby they requested and donated the same aid name Match aids many-to-many (many donors to many NGOs) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aid is produced

    To match a ngo with fews donors if their(donor) quantity of aid donated have not reached the quantity of aid ngo requested with condition that the aid donated and requested is same Match aids many-to-1 (many donors to 1 NGO) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aids is produced

    one_to_many()

  • Method Details

    • getALLaidsfromcsv

      public static ArrayList<AllAid> getALLaidsfromcsv(String username)
      To return the arraylist of aid where it stores all the aids donated and received, including those havent distributed, will show as "-"
      Parameters:
      username - is used to display the aids for selected users ADMIN is used to display the global view of DC (ALL THE MATCHINGS OF AIDS INCLUDING DONOR AND NGO)
      Returns:
      the list of all aids from the aids.csv file

    • getcompletedaidsfromcsv

      public static ArrayList<AllAid> getcompletedaidsfromcsv()

      Returns:
      all the completed for the completed matching aid

      Return the ArrayList OF DonatedAid that store the donated aids received from the donors
      Returns:
      the aids donated by the donors

      Return the ArrayList of RequestAid that store the list of aids requested by the NGOs
      Returns:
      the list of aids requested by the NGOs

    • getdonorfromcsv

      public static HashMap<String,Donor> getdonorfromcsv()
      Return the hashmap of the information of the donors user account
      Returns:
      the hashmap of the donors which key is username(unique) and value is Donor class

      Return the hashmap of the information of the ngo user account

      Used to check if the name of donor or ngo that is gonna register has duplicated name in the user.csv
      Returns:
      the hashset of the ngos and donors name

    • RegNewUser

      public static void RegNewUser(Map<String,NGO> ngos, Map<String,Donor> donors) throws IOException
      To update the new registered user (donors or NGO) into the user.csv file Any update is done is stored into the hashmap and the hashmaps are converted into csv strings
      Parameters:
      ngos - the information of the NGO (hashmap form)
      donors - the information of the donors (hashmap form)
      Throws:
      IOException - to declare an exception

    • updateaid

      public static void updateaid(ArrayList<AllAid> new_aids_list) throws IOException
      To update the latest arraylist of AllAid into aid.csv file
      Parameters:
      new_aids_list - arraylist of AllAid (including the newly added aid)
      Throws:
      IOException - to declare an execption

    • one_to_one

      public static void one_to_one()
      To match the donor and NGO who are donating or requesting the same name(type) and quantity of aids. Match aids 1-to-1 (1 donor to 1 NGO) The aids after matched are deleted and a completed matching aid is produced

    • many_to_one

      public static void many_to_one()
      To match a ngo with fews donors if their(donor) quantity of aid donated have not reached the quantity of aid ngo requested with condition that the aid donated and requested is same Match aids many-to-1 (many donors to 1 NGO) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aids is produced

    • one_to_many

      public static void one_to_many()
      To match a donor with fews ngo if their(ngo) quantity of aid requested have not reached the quantity of aid donor donated with condition that the aid donated and requested is same Match aids 1-to-many (1 donor to many NGOs) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aid is produced

    • many_to_many

      public static void many_to_many()
      To match fews donor with fews ngo for the condition whereby they requested and donated the same aid name Match aids many-to-many (many donors to many NGOs) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aid is produced

    • update_after_match

      public static void update_after_match(ArrayList<RequestedAid> Request, ArrayList<DonatedAid> Donate, ArrayList<AllAid> new_aids)
      Update the aids.csv file after matching(1 to 1, 1 to many, many to 1, many to many)
      Parameters:
      Request - the arraylist of RequestedAid that havent finish matching (null donor)
      Donate - the arraylist of DonatedAid that havent finish matching (null ngo)
      new_aids - the arraylist of AllAid that completed matching (no null ngo or null donor occur) The aids after matched are deleted if aid quantity is finished(0) and completed matching aid is produced

    • update_collected_aid_status_for

      public static void update_collected_aid_status_for(String name)
      Used to update the aid status from "Reserved" to "Completed" of the selected ngo
      Parameters:
      name - name of ngo inserted by user

    • check_ngo_name_exists

      public static boolean check_ngo_name_exists(String name)
      Used to check if the ngo inserted is available in the matched aids csv file
      Parameters:
      name - name of ngo inserted by user
      Returns:
      true if the ngo name do not found in the matched aid of aids csv file, false if the ngo name found in the matched aid of aids csv file

    • check_if_all_completed_aid

      public static boolean check_if_all_completed_aid(String name)
      Used to check if the ngo name has all completed aids
      Parameters:
      name - name of ngo inserted by user
      Returns:
      true if the all the aid of the selected ngo is under status "Completed", false if the there is some aid status of the selected ngo is "Reserved"
